Language.Sentence: The Form text type produces an object used for adding a single-line text input field. It can be contained only in the Form, Password, and Container objects.
Order of rendering the object on the page
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels
Define if the text presented as single line (can be submitted) or multiline (cannot be submitted)
Displays text in a text field, which disappears when it receives focus
Define if the focus is set there after rendering the page or not
Define if the autocomplete option is on or off
Index number of switching the elements on pressing the tab key
Define if the border is visible or not
When present, it specifies that field must be filled out before submitting the form
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
